Articles.Content: The question is simple: how do you change part icons? For now all you can have is a ? symbol, which isn\'t really good.
...and one more question: is there a way to add a custom part icon (e.g. for a rover), or are we limited to icons set already included in the package?

...and one more question: is there a way to add a custom part icon (e.g. for a rover), or are we limited to icons set already included in the package?

Indeed, like making a custom icon for your Computer Guidance part or Guided Missile

You can use the icons the game already has.


this.stackIcon.SetIcon(DefaultIcons.MYSTERY_PART);

You can use the icons the game already has.


this.stackIcon.SetIcon(DefaultIcons.MYSTERY_PART);

gah, the DefaultIcons thing is an enum...
